pages.heading: Miner's Secrets
pages.text: Exp-dropping blocks drop extra exp on successful harvest. Drops +2exp per block. Consumed when extra exp dropped.$(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords.$(br2)Applies: Miner's Secrets I (256 exp-dropping blocks)

pages.heading: Miner's Secrets L
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Miner's Secrets I (1024 exp-dropping blocks)

pages.heading: Miner's Secrets II
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment increases the yield to +4exp per block. $(br2)Applies: Miner's Secrets II (256 exp-dropping blocks)

pages.heading: Miner's Secrets XL
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts sixteen times longer. $(br2)Applies: Miner's Secrets I (4096 exp-dropping blocks)

pages.heading: Miner's Secrets III
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment increases the yield to +6exp per block. $(br2)Applies: Miner's Secrets III (256 exp-dropping blocks)
